titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Rice University scrolls representing Chairs, Scholarships, Lectureships, 1918-2013 UA 321
titlestmt.author: Lynda Crist

publicationstmt.publisher: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

note.p: Stored off-site at the Library Service Center. Please request this material via woodson@rice.edu or call 713-348-2586.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-05-12 09:21:56 -0500.

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.corpname: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

did.unittitle: Rice University scrolls representing Chairs, Scholarships, Lectureships
did.abstract: Rice University paper scrolls representing and describing gifts to Rice the establishment of Chairs, Scholarships, Lectureships, 1918-2013.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Academic life at Rice University is supported by generous donations to the university. In some cases, such gifts are made to support chairs, scholarships and lectureships. Printed scrolls are created to publicly recognize donors or the persons for whom the donations were made.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Rice University paper scrolls representing and describing gifts to Rice the establishment of Chairs, Scholarships, Lectureships, 1918-2013.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This material is open for research.
Stored off-site at the Library Service Center. Please request this material via woodson@rice.edu or call 713-348-2586.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred from the Development Office, Rice University.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Rice University scrolls representing Chairs, Scholarships, Lectureships, 1918-2013, UA 321, Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library, Rice University.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from this material must be facilitated through the Woodson Research Center. Contact woodson@rice.edu.
